name: Groundhog Day Again Quiz | Groundhog Day . | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the cafe in Punxutawney?
questions.explanation:
Tip Top.

	Phil ate there often.

questions.text: What was the television channel that Phil worked for?
What was the name of the high school that Nancy attended?
questions.explanation:
Lincoln High.

	Phil tricked her into telling them.

questions.text: How much did Larry sell for at the man auction?
questions.explanation:
25 cents.

	He was bought by an old woman for two bits (25 cents).

questions.text: What do Phil and Rita toast to at the bar?
questions.explanation:
World Peace.

	They drink Vermouth On The Rocks with a twist.

questions.text: What color truck does Phil drive when he kidnaps the groundhog?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	He even lets the groundhog drive.

questions.text: What was Phil making out of ice that impressed Rita and Larry?
questions.explanation:
Angel.

	Larry had never seen the sculpture of Rita's face.

questions.text: What was Rita's favorite flavor of ice cream?
questions.explanation:
Rocky Road.

	Phil knew all of Rita's favorite things.

questions.text: How much did Phil pay for piano lessons?
questions.explanation:
$1000.

	{$1000} dollars is cheap when you get money the way Phil did.

questions.text: Who was Phil dressed as when he went to the movies?
questions.explanation:
Clint Eastwood.

	His date was dressed as a maid.
